home.title: Sales Control - costrella
home.subtext:
Control the sales of your products based on reports added by
            Sales Representatives from the mobile app
home.webPart01sub:
Orders and reports are available immediately after being created by
                the Representative
home.webPart03sub: Notify the Representative from the app
home.webPart05sub: Orders from the mobile app automatically send orders to the wholesaler
home.webPart06sub: Products and everything else are synchronized with the mobile app
home.mobilePart01sub: Even without internet access you can create reports and orders
home.needMore03: The application is open to dedicated changes, contact us - we’ll discuss the details.
home.startFree02: Use completely free for 3 months, both Manager and Sales Representatives.
home.shareApp01: Send the app link to the representative
home.shareApp02: And give them the login and password
home.subtitle: Sales Control - Sales control.
